name: The Magician VR: The Cursed Wand
summary: Wand-based spellcasting in VR: trace gestures in the air, cast real spells, and strike back against invading monsters. Step into a dark, epic fantasy atmosphere as a mysterious invasion tears through a doomed city. Learn to control your wand with precision, unlock new spells and upgrades, and build a powerful magical arsenal. Face relentless waves of enemies, adapt your strategy, and grow from novice to formidable wizard.
